sql-select.name: GetListOfProceduresWithDecimalIssues
sql-select.description: Find all stored procedures where precision and scale not specified for decimals.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] INNER JOIN ( SELECT t.[id] FROM [dbo].[syscomments] t WHERE ( REPLACE(REPLACE(t.[text], N' ', N''), N'decimal]', N'decimal') LIKE N'%decimal[^(]%' OR REPLACE(REPLACE(t.[text], N' ', N''), N'numeric]', N'numeric') LIKE N'%[^i][^s]numeric[^(]%' ) GROUP BY t.[id] ) tSC ON tSC.[id] = tSO.[id] WHERE tSO.[xtype] = N'P' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] = N'SQL_STORED_PROCEDURE' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND ( REPLACE(REPLACE(Object_Definition(tSO.[object_id]), N' ', N''), N'decimal]', N'decimal') LIKE N'%decimal[^(]%' OR REPLACE(REPLACE(Object_Definition(tSO.[object_id]), N' ', N''), N'numeric]', N'numeric') LIKE N'%[^i][^s]numeric[^(]%' ) ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
